Mind the Gap (CPSC 210)

Mar 2016

Overview

Development Java, Android ADT, JSON, IntelliJ IDEA, SVN
Team size Solo
Category Course Project

Project description

Mind the Gap was the term project for CPSC 210. The app uses Transport for London (TfL) Open Data to obtain real-time information about arrivals in Londonâ€™s underground transit sytem and to plot tube stations and lines. The purpose of the project was to practice jUnit testing, the use of open APIs, JSON parsing and also becoming familiar with running device emulators.

Responsibilities

  • Implemented core classes (eg. Station, Line, Branch)
  • Implemented JSON parsing
  • Implemented rendering of polylines, markers
